welcome_fresh.title: Welcome to PaddiSense
welcome_fresh.description:
PaddiSense is a modular farm management platform for Home Assistant.

This wizard will:
1. Register your account
2. Download PaddiSense from GitHub
3. Configure Home Assistant

After setup, use the **PaddiSense Manager** dashboard to:
- Add farms and paddocks
- Install modules
- Manage seasons

Click Submit to continue.

registration.title: Account Registration
registration.description:
Enter your details to register.

Your email is used for verification and important notifications.

license.title: License Key
license.description:
If you have a PaddiSense license key, enter it below.

The license must be registered to: **{email}**

Leave blank to use free modules only (Weather, IPM, PWM, etc).
